item.title: Watch: Moment man vandalises ancient Incan artefact
item.description: Peruvian police released footage showing a suspect pounding Cusco's 12-Angle Stone.

item.title: Russian ambassador 'not sure' Ukrainians would re-elect Zelensky
item.description: The BBC asked the Russian ambassador if Zelensksy standing down is among Russia's demands as a condition of peace.

item.title: Trump calls Zelensky a 'dictator' as rift between two leaders deepens
item.description: The comments come as the latest salvo in a public war of words between the US and Ukrainian leaders.

item.title: Fog harvesting could provide water for arid cities
item.description: Research in Chile could help to provide drinking water for some of the world's most arid places.

item.title: Trump tells BBC that Russia has 'the cards' in peace negotiations
item.description: Trump told the BBC that he trusted that Moscow wants to see an end to the Ukraine war.
